sent.orig: Implement a superclass Person. Make two classes, Student and Instructor, that inherit from Person.
sent.trans: 实现一个超类person,制作两个类studentinstructor,这两个类可以从超类继承。

sent.orig: The word "person" is a countable noun.
Compare person, persons, people and peoples.
The words 'glad' and 'person' do not collocate.
Compared to other parts of the country, Person County's 39,000 residents are actually fortunate.
sent.trans: 和美国的其他地方比，Person县的39000位居民确实是幸运的。
